document.full_text: former u.s. open champion juan martin del potro staged a remarkable second-set comeback to beat top-seeded swede robin soderling 6-4 7-5 and reach the last four of the estoril open friday.
document.title: del potro beats soderling to reach estoril open semi
lines_and_colors: former u.s. open champion juan martin del potro staged a remarkable second-set comeback to beat top-seeded swede robin soderling 6-4 7-5 and reach the last four of the estoril open friday.
